title: Did Cregslist Add seek "minority representatives " of the Tulsa Caucus in Trump?
subtitle: Twitter sleuths linked Craigslist's announcement to paid minority representatives to the upcoming Trump Caucus in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The Craigslist Declaration offered to pay "minority representatives" to carry signs at the Trump Caucus in Tulsa, Oklahoma, on June 20, 2020.
